DOC.brief_summary: This study aims to evaluate the effect of SLN mapping compared to conventional radical PL on the incidence and severity of lymphedema in women with early stage cervical and endometrial cancer.
DOC.brief_title: Sentinel Node Mapping in Women With Cervical and Endometrial Cancer
DOC.criteria: Study IA: Cervical carcinoma, FIGO stage IB1, cervical tumour size < 2 cm Study IB: Endometrial adenocarcinoma, presumed FIGO stage I, low and intermediate risk: Type 1 grade 1 + 2, > 50% myometrial invasion Prior PL Known allergy towards ICG and/or iodine (ICG contains 5% sodium iodine) Women included in other studies affecting outcomemeasures of the present study
